name: PreLiving
description:
Hello! I am a Chinese high school student. This is the first game I developed in two and a half days. This is also the prelude to "Living yet,zig-zag".
  The game material comes from GB-Studio-Community on github. You can find it here: https://github.com/deertears/gb-studio-community-assets/

Built in GBstudio.

So the story is like this: a girl gets up and goes to school.

Testers:
Cap_ L3F1
Kale
Bill_Cipher
ZhenAiKun 2.5

Something wrong? Send me an email at: cap_l3f1@outlook.com
Hope you'll enjoy it!
